title: Smart Glasses for the Blind With Proximity Sensors and GPS Based on the Internet Of Things
description: Innovative auxiliary tool for the blind that can be monitored through a device so that it can be petrified and keep users from hitting objects in front of them.

title: Competitive Fund Program: PiDAQ
description: PiDAQ (Polines IoT Data Acquisition), IoT-based industrial data acquisition module using industrial internet of things (IIoT) technology.

title: IoT-based Hydroponic Monitoring
description: Provides accurate monitoring of environmental parameters such as humidity, temperature, soil pH, and nutrients, which are crucial for hydroponic plant growth.
